quote: first lay plans which will ensure victory, and then lead your army to battle;Â  if you will not begin with stratagem but rely on brute strength alone, victory will no longer be assured
quote_letters: FIRST LAY PLANS WHICH WILL ENSURE VICTORY AND THEN LEAD YOUR ARMY TO BATTLE IF YOU WILL NOT BEGIN WITH STRATAGEM BUT RELY ON BRUTE STRENGTH ALONE VICTORY WILL NO LONGER BE ASSURED
source: Sun Tzu, The Art of War
